sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) Once per session, when the character is falling, he may perform the Impossible Fall incidental. He makes a force power check and may spend force poitns to land somewhere safe, such as on a pile of empty boxes in a street or a muddy spot in the middle of a lava field. The character may then spend additional force points to reduce the effects of the fall by one range band and may do so multiple times.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Impossible Fall</name> <number>TAL0001321</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-20 15:35:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f73ea06c2fc3cd10e0f497eef699b625</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-20 15:35:22</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
